name: Humongous
description: Themed after the campy, 1981 Canadian B-Horror movie "Humongous", this large, puzzle filled, detailed text-adventure finds you everywhere from stranded on a boat, lost on an island, on top of a lighthouse, to an old abandoned house, face to face with a deformed beast, and more.  Learn the story of the island and the horrors behind it.  Blah Blah Blah.  Seriously, a fun text adventure for those who enjoy them.
